Package io.micronaut.context.event

Class BeanInitializingEvent<T>

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEvent
io.micronaut.context.event.BeanContextEvent
io.micronaut.context.event.BeanEvent<T>
io.micronaut.context.event.BeanInitializingEvent<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The event type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BeanInitializingEvent<T> extends BeanEvent<T>

An event fired when a bean's properties have been populated but initialization hooks (such as PostConstruct methods) have not yet been triggered.

To listen to an event for a fully initialized bean see BeanCreatedEvent

Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
